name: progminer/php-datagen
description: Code generator for making data classes on PHP

install-deps: if [ ! -d jlex-php ] ; then git clone https://github.com/ProgMiner/jlex-php ; fi
if [ ! -d kmyacc ] ; then git clone https://github.com/moriyoshi/kmyacc-forked kmyacc ; fi
cd kmyacc && make all && cp src/kmyacc .
regen-lexer: for file in `find app -type f | grep -ox '.*\.lex'` ; do dest=`echo $file | grep -o '\(.*\.\)*'`php ; java -jar jlex-php/JLexPHP.jar -v $file $dest ; done
regen-parser: for file in `find app -type f | grep -ox '.*\.phpy'` ; do kmyacc/kmyacc -l -m `echo $file | grep -o '\(.*\.\)*'`php.tpl $file ; done
